title: Flight 93 National Memorial: Stories
body: Stories                         Untold Stories The National Park Service has now collected oral histories from more than 750 individuals with a direct connection to Flight 93. Up until now, the voices of students who were in the Shanksville-Stonycreek School near the crash site that day, have been absent. Watch a brief video clip of an effort to change that.  Duration:3 minutes, 39 seconds           Â    The memorial design commemorates the collective actions of the 40 passengers and crew.  The Memorial Expression is a tribute them.
